part.Name: Description
part.Short: ほこりが不可解な装置を粉々にする。

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Dust powders the gigantic device.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Light gleams off the edging of a small curio.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Tubes of unknown purpose splay at welded joints.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A sitting object of vacant intent catches dust and offlight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Knobs and rivets crisscross the inscrutable machine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A strange substance fills a channel of glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]An unknown organ bleats with the desperation of life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]An unfamiliar tendril of green in leaf-sheath circles itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Blemishes cross the short barrel of an unidentified gun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Blemishes cross the long barrel of an unidentified gun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Smokescar blackens the iron sight and stretches down the big gun's main channel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Stretch wire connects the nocks of an unidentified bow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A cannister of blast is sheathed in undeciphered metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A hunk of fused material makes a beating stick.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A sharp edge tops a strange hilt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A blade of considerable length runs through a strange hilt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A bladed edge hangs over a finger-smudged haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A curved screen of bang-hard surface material is wielded by a welded grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A shaped cuirass of unknown origin protects the good portion of a body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A head topper was fashioned for unknown purpose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A false face was shaped to fashion and stitched with unknown intent.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Rounded seers are held by a strap.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: 奇妙なミトンはほとんどの手首と指に適する。

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A rounded torc gleams for unintended eyes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Fabric of some type was sutured to an unknown end.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]A strapped sack was sewn for carrying something.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: 長年の使用による傷が履物の表面を十字になる。

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]It's a vessel of well and unusual make.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]Bits sleep until animated inside their rectangle coffin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODÖ]The array of strange parts are summed together as a kind of tool.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: 空の空気がガラスのパイプに圧力をかける。
